sentences.english: The pain in his left foot is accompanied by redness and swelling.
sentences.chinese: 左腳痠痛，並有紅腫，中變合擊。

sentences.english: To see where the chicken Aunt eyes are red and swollen crying.
sentences.chinese: 到了那裏看到雞大嬸雙眼都哭得紅腫了。

sentences.english: Swelling and pain with redness or ecchymosis in the injured area because of the obstruction.
sentences.chinese: 扭傷局部因瘀阻而腫脹疼痛，傷處肌膚出現紅腫青紫。

sentences.english: The eyes bloodshot with tears and tide.
sentences.chinese: 潮湧的淚水在紅腫的眼中流淌。

sentences.english: End of the game, the two children's cheeks are red and swollen.
sentences.chinese: 比賽結束時，兩童的臉頰都已紅腫。

sentences.english: Even sweating brings the 19-year-old out in a painful rash.
sentences.chinese: 即使出汗都會讓這個19歲的女孩紅腫一片。

sentences.english: Her face was tear-stained, her eyes were red and puffy.
sentences.chinese: 她的臉上還掛着淚水，雙眼紅腫。

sentences.english: Inadvertently, I found, she had a red hand, be a tie.
sentences.chinese: 無意中，我發現，她手上有一塊紅腫，被針眼扎過。

sentences.english: Conclusion Arnebia oil has a good therapeutic effect on perianal smelling induced by diarrhea in neurosurgial pa…
sentences.chinese: 結論紫草油對腹瀉所致的肛周紅腫有較好的療效。

sentences.english: The catcher isn't too concerned about an inflamed right elbow.
sentences.chinese: 這名捕手不會很擔心他發炎紅腫的右手肘。

sentences.english: Looseness, redness, and soreness in this area are all indications of infection.
sentences.chinese: 鬆動，紅腫，疼痛，並在這一領域的所有跡象感染。

sentences.english: The prisoner's swollen mouth widened in a grin;
sentences.chinese: 囚徒紅腫的嘴脣翕動了一下，露齒一笑。
一貼治療眼睛紅腫的膏藥。

definition: wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
